intro.name: Fauzan Ghaza Madani
intro.works_at: Informatics Engineering Students at University of Brawijaya | Passionate About Data Science & Network Engineering

about.about_description:
👋 Hi there! I'm Fauzan, an Informatics Engineering student at Brawijaya University with a passion for Data Science, Machine Learning, and Computer Networking. 🌐 My journey so far includes hands-on experience in processing big data, building ML models, and making sense of complex data.

Beyond the classroom, I serve as a practicum assistant, guiding peers through their learning process. I've led numerous projects, such as developing a dynamic website for Richdjoe Barbershop using Laravel, which showcases my ability to translate technical skills into real-world solutions. Check out the live project [https://richdjoe.fauzanghaza.com].

💡 With a knack for problem-solving and a curiosity for new technologies, I'm always eager to expand my analytical and programming skills. From designing efficient network topologies using GNS3 to conducting sentiment analysis on social media regarding the 2024 Indonesian election, I continually seek to apply scientific principles to innovate and improve.

Open to collaboration on exciting tech projects and internship opportunities, feel free to connect or explore my projects on GitHub [https://github.com/ghazafm]. Let's transform ideas into impactful solutions together! 🚀

projects.project_title: Population Administration System for Ngaringan Village
projects.description: The Population Administration System for Ngaringan Village is a comprehensive web application designed to streamline the management of population data in Ngaringan Village, Blitar Regency. This platform centralizes various types of data, including resident records, family cards, housing information, and health data for pregnant women. It serves as a vital tool for village administrators (supervisors) and dasawisma (data inputters), offering a streamlined approach to data entry, management, and oversight.

As part of a dedicated team, I contributed to the development of a comprehensive website for Richdjoe Barbershop, located in Malang. Our project aimed to enhance the online presence and streamline the booking process for the barbershop. Utilizing the Laravel framework, we created a robust and user-friendly website that effectively showcases the services, team, and contact information of Richdjoe Barbershop.

Key highlights of the project include:
- Framework and Tools: Built using Laravel, a powerful PHP framework, ensuring a scalable and maintainable codebase.
- Features: Implemented an intuitive booking system, service listings, and a gallery showcasing the barbershop's work.
- Design: Focused on creating a modern and appealing design that aligns with the brand identity of Richdjoe Barbershop.
- Collaboration: Worked closely with a talented team, following agile methodologies to ensure timely and efficient project completion.

For more details, you can explore our project repositories and the live website:

- GitHub Repository: [Richdjoe Barbershops Website](https://github.com/ghazafm/richdjoe-barbershops-website.git)
- Live Website: [Richdjoe Barbershop](https://richdjoe.fauzanghaza.com/)

about.about_description:
I am an enthusiast and a life-long learner in technology. Currently focusing in Front-End Programming, especially web development, and machine learning. Although the technology field is my main focus, I still use and sharpen my design skills in various activities.

Currently studying Informatics Engineering bachelor degree in Brawijaya University, Indonesia, and an active member of Tanoto Scholars Association Universitas Brawijaya

Staff of Information and Technology Development Bureau
experience.description: I'm starting a new position as a staff of Information and Technology Development Division at PKKMB & Startup Academy FILKOM UB 2023. In this event, my division and I provide website needed to make PKKMB & Startup Academy FILKOM UB 2023 as a successful introduction event to the new undergraduate students at FILKOM UB. My role in this division is as a front-end developer.

experience.job_title: Expert Staff of Information and Technology Development Bureau
experience.description: My role here in this bureau as a front-end web developer. We mainly work on our organization's websites, such as BEM FILKOM's websites, SJW FIILKOM's websites. We also work on web request for other events from FILKOM like open recruitment for HOLOGY, FILAFEST, and such. In my period of work, we also have a working program called "IT Partnership" where we offer service to make website for everyone in public.

experience.job_title: Staff of Development Team of FILKOM ABDIMASA 2023
experience.description: Development Team, in FILKOM ABDIMASA 2023, is the team/division whose jobdesk is to develop the website needed to make this work program a successful One. FILKOM ABDIMASA itself stands for Fakultas Ilmu Komputer Pengabdian Masyarakat (Faculty of Computer Science's Community/Society Service. This program was started as one of BEM FILKOM 2023 ministry's working program, Social and Environment Ministry. The goal is to help local village so it can be more advanced in technology and promoting village's potential to the fullest, in this case tourism potential.

intro.name: Muhammad Rafly Ash Shiddiqi
intro.works_at: AI & Data Science Enthusiast | Undergraduate Informatics Engineering Students at Brawijaya University

about.about_description:
Seorang mahasiswa jurusan Teknik Informatika di Fakultas Ilmu Komputer, Universitas Brawijaya, dengan minat mendalam dalam bidang Data Science dan AI Engineering. Saya percaya bahwa teknologi dan data memiliki potensi besar untuk membentuk masa depan, dan saya berusaha untuk menjadi seorang profesional yang dapat menggabungkan keahlian teknis dengan wawasan bisnis untuk mencapai hasil yang signifikan.

Saya telah berkomitmen untuk memperluas pengetahuan saya melalui berbagai platform belajar, seperti Dicoding dan Coursera, di mana saya telah menyelesaikan sejumlah kursus penting, termasuk Data Science dasar, pemrograman Python, visualisasi data, SQL, analisis data, Machine Learning, serta pengembangan Machine Learning. Selain itu, saya juga mengambil kursus Exploratory Data Analysis for Machine Learning di Coursera serta kursus Supervised Machine Learning: Regression and Classification untuk memperdalam pemahaman saya tentang Data Science dan Artificial Intelligence.

Saya juga aktif berkontribusi dalam kegiatan non-akademis. Saya saat ini menjadi seorang volunteer dalam acara FILAFEST 2023, di mana saya dapat berpartisipasi dalam mengorganisir dan menyelenggarakan berbagai kegiatan acara dies natalis Fakultas Ilmu Komputer tahun 2023. Selain itu, saya memiliki pengalaman berharga sebagai peserta dalam Youth Today AIESEC x AFL Winter Peak 2023 dan Youth Today x Join AIESEC 2023, yang memberikan saya kesempatan untuk mempelajari proyek-proyek global yang menekankan kolaborasi, kepemimpinan, dan pengembangan diri.

Saya senang untuk terhubung dengan rekan-rekan seprofesi, berbagi ide, dan berkolaborasi dalam proyek-proyek yang dapat memanfaatkan pengetahuan dan keterampilan saya di bidang Data Science dan AI Engineering. Jangan ragu untuk menghubungi saya untuk berdiskusi atau berkenalan lebih lanjut. Terima kasih!
